name: Mischief's Swell Day
description:
Short and Sweet Top-down shooter starring Mischief from ShamefulRadio's Wicked Pump!

Controls: wasd/arrow keys to move, left click to shoot, and... guess that's it.

The game should just play in the browser with no download needed, but if you have issues there's an additional standalone build you can play instead. Just click the download link, unpack it and run the executable.

Go check out Radio's RPG game here! (trust me, it's way better)

...Oh, also inflation. There's lots of that here. There's your warning even though you almost definitely knew that already.
